desc.zh: 杭州地铁是指服务于中国浙江省杭州市及杭州都市圈各地区的城市轨道交通，其首条线路杭州地铁1号线于2012年11月24日正式开通，使杭州成为华东地区第四个、浙江省首个开通地铁的城市。
desc.en: Hangzhou Metro refers to the urban rail transit serving Hangzhou City and Hangzhou Metropolitan Area in Zhejiang Province, China, and its first line, Hangzhou Metro Line 1, was officially opened on November 24, 2012, making Hangzhou the fourth city in East China and the first city in Zhejiang Province to open a metro.

updateHistory.reason: Change line name and railway or airport style. Also fixing English names.
